name: @guptabhishek/multi-search-mcp
description: Provide unified web search capabilities by leveraging multiple search providers with automatic fallback to maximize your search quota. Perform searches across Google, Tavily, DuckDuckGo, and Brave with standardized results through a single MCP tool. Easily configure and integrate into your AI workflows to enhance search automation.

tools.name: search
tools.description: Performs a web search using multiple providers (google, tavily, duckduckgo, brave).

provider.description: Optional: Specify a provider directly (google, tavily, duckduckgo, brave). If omitted, uses priority fallback.
